page.title: 12INTERVIEW cont.
page.content: In his younger days community life centred around the chapel,with people congregating there on most evenings for various activities.The other meeting place was the blacksmith's forge situated on the site of the present days "Bridge End Inn."Today's meeting place are the same but fewer people attend the chapel and the Inn has replaced the forge. During the last two decades,motor transport has made the area less isolated and the inhabitants make daily journeys to the local town of Fishguard for work,school and shopping.There aren't any shops in Llanychaer.
